# Reporter SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#388c34][bold]Reporter[/bold][/color] of this station.
1. The Reporter is not permitted to spam out news articles with low-effort editing.
2. The Reporter is to properly receive access when moving into Departments from a staff of the Department.
3. The Reporter should properly title their News Articles with relation to the report within the article.
4. The Reporter should request access to Secure Areas by contacting the Captain and/or Relevant Head of Staff.
5. The Reporter is permitted to speak to imprisoned personnel and to attend all trial meetings with equipment for recording.
